subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Tampa Bay Rays have the No. 1 pick in the draft, just as they did last year, and and as a rising club that expects to keep improving, there is an added sense of urgency to make the right call.
snippet: The Tampa Bay Rays have the No. 1 pick in the draft, just as they did last year, and and as a rising club that expects to keep improving, there is an added sense of urgency to make the right call.
